title: Silenced Hearts
description: I have been writing poems all my life. When I was in school I would write instead of listen and dream of different poems and stories. My passion is poetry. I love to write and if I donâ€™t write I feel very depressed. Writing my poetry and stories helps me emotionally. This book has 49 poems. Poems about love and hearts. I am a Christian.
author: Deborah Brooks Langford
